title: My Dark Self
description: Josslyn is a normal 28 year old woman, but she holds a dark secret. She has a voice in her head who she calls Alicia ... who just happens to be a psychopath. Josslyn must uncover the truth about who Alicia really is and deal with the deadly consequences of her own actions."My name is Josslyn and I'm a psychopath. Actually, that's not technically true....let me explain.""My name is Alicia and I am a psychopath."There are two people in my head, but Alicia is dangerous and I can't control her anymore.....but who (or what) is she?Also, why do I get the feeling I'm being followed â€¦ and why don't cats like me?
author: Jessica  Huntley
